metadata.synopsis: The caretaker warns the player to leave the egg. If it is repeated, he starts a fight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Set if you interact with the egg and the caretaker sees you. Or if he spots you while the Egg dialog is ongoing.

0.speaker: Varsh Ko'kuu
0.text: Do not touch the egg! This is your final warning, k'chakhi.

1.speaker: Varsh Ko'kuu
1.text: I told you not to touch the egg - this foolishness ends here.
1.context: NodeContext: Aggressive; he's about to forcefully expel the player from the hatchery (with violence)
